text.en: To the manifold display of Blazing Light Lotus—sovereign of awareness—
The gurus, the yidams, the ḍākinīs, and the Dharma protectors,
And the deities of the Assembled Realization of the Gurus2—to all of you, I pray!
text.en-trans: lama gongdü lha la solwa deb

text.en: To awareness, the supreme method, the blood-drinker Düdül Lingpa;
text.en-trans: rigpa tab chok traktung düdul ling

text.en: To the identity of emptiness, the secret consort, Flower-Holder;
text.en-trans: tongpé daknyi sang yum metok chang

text.en: To awareness and emptiness indivisible, Chokgyur Lingpa—
To all of you, I pray! Please bless my mindstream!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: In this temporary state, may we have bliss and joy, may negativity be subdued, and may the positive increase.
text.en-trans: nekab dekyi nyé zhi lek pel né

text.en: May we enjoy the splendor of the first eon, the Golden Age,
text.en-trans: dzokden dangpö pal la chö gyur né

text.en: And at death go swiftly to the palace of Lotus Light!
text.en-trans: chi tsé pema ö du nyur drö shok
